alert.note: Alert for Carlisle; Graves; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 19 at 8:25AM EDT until July 19 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR FANCY FARM, WINGO, BEULAH, AND DUBLIN AND SURROUNDING RURAL AREAS... The National Weather Service in Paducah has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Carlisle County in western Kentucky... Southwestern Graves County in western Kentucky... Northeastern Hickman County in western Kentucky... * Until noon CDT. * At 725 AM CDT, Emergency management reported widespread dangerous flooding continues across the warned area. Between 6 and 8 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are expected in the warned area. This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for Fancy Farm, Wingo, Beulah, and Dublin and surrounding rural areas. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Fulgham, Wingo and Arlington. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CATASTROPHIC
info.instruction: Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
